accueil.metaDesc: Homepage of the clothing designer 100% made in Quebec, designed by TIM students using AI-generated designs, and made with 100% natural and organic fibers.
accueil.amorceTitre: T-shirts, hoodies, and caps made in Quebec 💯
accueil.amorceSousTitre2: with a little help from DALL-E 😉
accueil.para1: Today, the T-shirt is a staple in everyone's wardrobe. And in an era where environmental issues are more pressing than ever, we prefer T-shirts made in Quebec to reduce environmental impact and highlight local craftsmanship.
accueil.para2: V-neck, round neck, loose or fitted, short sleeves or long sleeves for the chilly, plain or patterned to style an outfit... The T-shirt is available in a variety of colors, styles, and patterns.

teeshirts.metaTitre: teeTIM // our collection of super cool T-shirts
